mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( oname, oemail, ofirsthnum, osecondhnum, othirdhnum, ofirstph, osecondph, othirdph, opost_num, oload_nm, olot_addr, odetail_addr, oref, rname, rpost_num, rload_nm, rlot_addr, rdetail_addr, rref, rfirsthnum, rsecondhnum, rthirdhnum, rfirstph, rsecondph, rthirdph, msg, pay_method, payagent_agree_flag, buy_date ) VALUES ( #{oname}, #{oemail}, #{ofirsthnum}, #{osecondhnum}, #{othirdhnum}, #{ofirstph}, #{osecondph}, #{othirdph}, #{opost_num}, #{oload_nm}, #{olot_addr}, #{odetail_addr}, #{oref}, #{rname}, #{rpost_num}, #{rload_nm}, #{rlot_addr}, #{rdetail_addr}, #{rref}, #{rfirsthnum}, #{rsecondhnum}, #{rthirdhnum}, #{rfirstph}, #{rsecondph}, #{rthirdph}, #{msg}, ${pay_method}, #{payagent_agree_flag}, #{buy_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.sm, A.md, A.lg, A.xl, A.color, A.iboard, A.icart, A.checked, A.idetail, B.iuser, C.img_url_big, C.title, C.price FROM cart A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN product_list C ON A.iboard = C.iboard WHERE B.iuser = ${iuser} AND A.checked = 1
